attributes.review: I’ve read a bunch of comments, and have to agree. This app runs awfully, I expected more from our great and all mighty president. With his amazing views I would expect a source of his to also be amazing. Constantly glitches and lags and shuts me out of the app!! I recommend taking it down and possibly trying again once it’s fixed
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: I got this app because I was very excited to find that trump has an only fans. But upon opening this app I was bombarded with the most DISGUSTING AND VILE image i have ever seen!!!!! It was his wrinkled, uncircumcised, cheeto color and size looking pen*s!!!! I feel bad for Malania 😬!! But anyways I had to put bleach in my eyes to get that image out, but that unsightly image it will remain in my head forever and ever. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!
attributes.title: DO NOT OPEN THE APP

attributes.review:
I kept hearing everyone talk about good MY president was, so out of curiosity I downloaded the app. IMMEDIATELY I was shown a BUNCH of DISTURBING photos of a 🍊🤡. A big light began to shine over me as my vision slowly left me after looking at that ugly thing! Luckily my cat who had superpowers and was secretly a demigod saved me! 
DONT❌ BUY 💢THE 🤬 APP 👺‼️
Horrible service too, ugh do NOT buy this app unless you have a death wish!1!!11!!!
attributes.title: ❌💢I ALMOST WENT BLIND 🤬👺‼️

attributes.review:
I’m afraid of 2020 because 2+0+2+0 equals 4 and that how many nipples trump would have had if he had two more. I don’t have anything against 4 nipples just against trump🧚🏼‍♂️🌟🌸 🧚🏿

as one wise gen z human said on tik tok “can’t wait to see trump 2020... In jail.”✨🌺🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏿‍♀️

also i hated this app. when i downloaded it for some reason it made my dog pee on the floor. unacceptable. 1 star. 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏿‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️🌸💕
attributes.title: Terrible app🌸⭐️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏿‍♀️✨🧚🏿

attributes.review: It’s disgusting how horrible this app is I opened it to sign up and a bird flew into my head and gave me a concussion it’s so bad I hate this app I will never use it again I can’t believe this  president would even have this something like this up that just shows bad leader ship skills I hate this app with my heart I will never use it again this app is horrible
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I’ve ever used. I’m sorry right from the start it was an awful, glitchy, bigotfest. Cannot support it on the App Store, if I could give it less than one star I would. Anyways, just because it’s not still on the news, the BLM movement is still going strong and you can help by donating to bail funds and supporting black-owned businesses ✨
attributes.title: Bigly Bad

attributes.review: No I’m not a liberal, #repub4ever I love trump... however this app took forever to download and it was spamming me w emails so I’m pretty sure it got hacked from this app. I am appalled!! I love this soon to be president but not this app!! I need to make a new email now. I deleted the app too and still got notifications. Trump is cool but this app is so unnecessary when we could look stuff up on the web
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: when i opened it up it called me the n-word with hard R and i just kept saying white power. i am beyond disgusted it also completely took over my how phone when ever i would do anything it just has a notification that says you can’t delete this app. my phone will forever be terrorized by this
attributes.title: this app is horrible

attributes.review: The worst app to literally ever exist! The lack of knowledge and the incredible amount of ignorance and hate is insane. It disgust me that it’s even still in the App Store. Most useless app and highly unnecessary. If you get this app, you are wasting your time and the space in your phone. Please think twice before getting.✨🥰🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: Don’t even think about getting it!!!

attributes.review: I was on my phone 📱 when I was about to vote for the peach man I saw a crowd of oranges on my counter they were holding a sharp object saying “vote for trump “ vote for trump” I said no why would I do that! And they all walked and held a knife to my throat they took me as a hostage to see the orange/peach king he told them to kill when I said I’m never voting for him but then I said I’ll vote and he left into his rat airplane. DO NOT GET THIS APP👿
attributes.title: ALMOST DIED DONT DOWNLOAD💀
